con:settings.con:setting: <xml-fragment xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config"> <con:entry key="Environment" value="Default"/> <con:entry key="Global Properties" value=""/> <con:entry key="TestSuite" value="matchostat"/> <con:entry key="Password" value=""/> <con:entry key="soapui-setings.xml Password" value=""/> <con:entry key="TestRunner Path" value=""/> <con:entry key="Tool Args" value=""/> <con:entry key="Ignore Errors" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Host:Port" value=""/> <con:entry key="WSS Password Type" value=""/> <con:entry key="Save Project" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Enable UI" value="false"/> <con:entry key="System Properties" value=""/> <con:entry key="Domain" value=""/> <con:entry key="Coverage Report" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Export JUnit Results" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Open Report" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Project Properties" value=""/> <con:entry key="Export All" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Project Password" value=""/> <con:entry key="Report Format(s)" value=""/> <con:entry key="TestCase" value="<all>"/> <con:entry key="Print Report" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Username" value=""/> <con:entry key="Root Folder" value=""/> <con:entry key="Save After" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Add Settings" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Endpoint" value=""/> <con:entry key="Select Report Type" value=""/> </xml-fragment>

con:testCase.name: Get all Players and Delete them
con:testCase.con:description: Note: Players in Teams will not be deleted. Delete all Games first

con:configuration.scriptText:
//Store created playerId for later use groovyUtils = new com.eviware.soapui.support.GroovyUtils(context)
//Store player name for later use requestBody = context.getProperty("Update Player","Request") slurper = new groovy.json.JsonSlurper() request = slurper.parseText( requestBody ) groovyUtils.setPropertyValue("Get Player", "playerName", request.name)

con:testCase.name: Create Player and Game with Teams

con:configuration.scriptText:
//Assert Location in HTTP header location = messageExchange.responseHeaders["Location"][0] reqEx = /.*rest\\/players\\/([0-9]+)/ matcher = (location =~ reqEx) assert matcher.matches()
//Store created playerId for later use playerId = matcher[0][1] messageExchange.modelItem.testCase.setPropertyValue( "playerId1", playerId)

//Assert Location in HTTP header location = messageExchange.responseHeaders["Location"][0] reqEx = /.*rest\\/players\\/([0-9]+)/ matcher = (location =~ reqEx) assert matcher.matches()
//Store created playerId for later use playerId2 = matcher[0][1] messageExchange.modelItem.testCase.setPropertyValue( "playerId2", playerId2)

//Assert Location in HTTP header location = messageExchange.responseHeaders["Location"][0] reqEx = /.*rest\\/players\\/([0-9]+)/ matcher = (location =~ reqEx) assert matcher.matches()
//Store created playerId for later use playerId3 = matcher[0][1] messageExchange.modelItem.testCase.setPropertyValue( "playerId3", playerId3)

con:testCase.name: Get all Games and Delete them
Post Goal for Player in Team

con:configuration.scriptText:
//Assert Location in HTTP header location = messageExchange.responseHeaders["Location"][0] reqEx = /.*rest\\/players\\/([0-9]+)/ matcher = (location =~ reqEx) assert matcher.matches()
//Store created playerId for later use playerId2 = matcher[0][1] messageExchange.modelItem.testCase.setPropertyValue( "playerId2", playerId2)

//Assert Location in HTTP header location = messageExchange.responseHeaders["Location"][0] reqEx = /.*rest\\/players\\/([0-9]+)/ matcher = (location =~ reqEx) assert matcher.matches()
//Store created playerId for later use playerId3 = matcher[0][1] messageExchange.modelItem.testCase.setPropertyValue( "playerId3", playerId3)

//Assert playerId content = messageExchange.getResponseContent() slurper = new groovy.json.JsonSlurper() result = slurper.parseText( content )
playersTeam1 = [] playersTeam1.add(result.team1.players[0].id) playersTeam1.add(result.team1.players[1].id)
playerId1 = messageExchange.modelItem.testCase.getPropertyValue( "playerId1").toInteger() playerId2 = messageExchange.modelItem.testCase.getPropertyValue( "playerId2").toInteger() playerId3 = messageExchange.modelItem.testCase.getPropertyValue( "playerId3").toInteger()
assert playersTeam1.contains(playerId1) assert playersTeam1.contains(playerId2) assert result.team2.players[0].id == playerId3
